pr_title: [FLINK-20570][docs] Fix the `NOTE` tip style in process_function page

timeline.message: [FLINK-20570][docs] The `NOTE` tip style is different from the others in process_function page

timeline.bodyText: I think **NOTE:** is used in more places?
timeline.author: wuchong

replies.bodyText: I think **NOTE:** is used in more places? **NOTE:** is used only one place in process_function.md, and Note is used in more places.
replies.author: shizhengchao

timeline.bodyText: This is useful to scroll to the page top. You can find the top link is used in many places.
